benchmark_details.name: TestBench
benchmark_details.overview: TestBench is the first class-level benchmark to evaluate the capability of LLMs on test case generation task. It includes a dataset of 108 Java programs sourced from large-scale open-source projects, and a comprehensive evaluation framework considering five aspects of test cases.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of TestBench is to evaluate the effectiveness of large language models in generating test cases for software programs.

data.source: The dataset is constructed from 108 Java programs sourced from 9 large-scale open-source projects on GitHub.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on static analysis for syntax, dynamic compilation for correctness, and mutation testing for defect detection.
methodology.interpretation: Higher metrics indicate better performance in generating more reliable and correct test cases.
